<a id='Installation-1'></a>

## Installation


test This package is registered in `METADATA.jl` and so can be installed using `Pkg.add`


```julia
Pkg.add("ClimateTools")
```


For the latest version, checkout master branch


```julia
Pkg.checkout("ClimateTools")
```
